reservation package¶

Submodules¶

reservation.cm_reservation module¶

reservation.reservation_client module¶

Created on May 5, 2014

@author: oliver

class reservation.reservation_client.ReservationClient(serviceArg)[source]¶

Bases: object

This class contains all the events that the calendar supports New events can be appended at the bottom

add(rsv)[source]¶

An event is a JSON object that is passes to his method to be added to the calendar

durationOfRsv(rsvId)[source]¶

Shows the duration of the reservation

getAll()[source]¶

Selects all events in the calendar

lstRsvProj(projId)[source]¶

Lists all the reservations made in a particular project

lstUsrProjRsvSTimeETime(userId, projId, sTime, eTime)[source]¶

Lists all the users reservations made in a project from a start-time to a end time

removeAll()[source]¶

Removes all the events from the calendar

removeReservation(rsvId)[source]¶

Removes a specific event from the calendar. Requires the reservationID

reschedule(oldRsvId, newRsv)[source]¶

Used to update or modify an old event. Requires old event id and new Event object that will replace the old event

selectRsvIdFromLabel(labelStr)[source]¶

Assuming this label will return only one eventId

selectRsvIdsFromUser(userId)[source]¶

Selects all the reservations made by a user

viewReservationFromId(rsvId)[source]¶

displays the reservation object

reservation.reservation_client.checkRsvOverlap(service, newRsv)[source]¶
